mapper.select: SELECT m.id AS id, m.title AS title, m.level AS level, GROUP_CONCAT(ft.name) AS fitnessTypes FROM user_mission um JOIN mission m ON um.mission_id = m.id JOIN mission_attribute ma ON m.id = ma.mission_id JOIN fitness_type ft ON ma.fitness_type_id = ft.id WHERE um.user_id = #{userId} AND um.status = 1 GROUP BY m.id
